definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be much, many (as. kabâru, be great, mighty; kabru, great, huge; Ar. kabura be great, in body, rank, or age, kabiyrun great, noble, aged; Eth. kabra: be honoured, magnified; kbur: honoured, glorious; Sab. epith. [[כבר]] Hal:Ét. Sab. JAs. Dec. 1874, No. 90; Syr. kbar, 0akbar for Heb. [[רָבָה]], [[הִרְבָּה]], kabiyr (rare) much; Zinj. be abundant, numerous)—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: (only Elihu) make many, Job 35:16 [[בִּבְלִי דַעַת מִלִּין יַכְבִּר]] (cf. [[וְיֶרֶב אֲמָרָיו]] Job 34:37) > make great, Bu:Beitr. 138, comparing Job 8:2; [[מַכְבִּיר]] with the force of a subst. (Ew:§ 160 c) Job 36:31 [[לְמַכְֶבִּיר]] [[יתן אכל]] giveth food in abundance (= prose [[לָוֹב]], e.g. 2Ch 11:23).
